## Technical delivery
<!--
Covering the actual delivery of the project this section should provide at least a high-level the implementation.

Including target dates is really important as you need to be committed and the ISC need to have a means of tracking delivery
-->

- Month 1-4: Implement performance optimizations and benchmark improvements.
- Month 4-6: Enhance error handling and debugging capabilities.
- Month 6-7: Set up EC2 instance and deploy example applications.
- Month 7-8: Develop core documentation structure and initial content.
- Month 8-12: Create in-depth book on ambiorix.
